haemmerl-etal-2023-speaking.title: Speaking Multiple Languages Affects the Moral Bias of Language Models
haemmerl-etal-2023-speaking.author: Haemmerl, Katharina  and Deiseroth, Bjoern  and Schramowski, Patrick  and Libovick{\'y}, Jind{\v{r}}ich  and Rothkopf, Constantin  and Fraser, Alexander  and Kersting, Kristian
haemmerl-etal-2023-speaking.paperMotivationText: Investigate whether LMs capture moral norms from English and impose them on other languages
haemmerl-etal-2023-speaking.paperContributionText: MORAL DIRECTION framework for modelling moral norms in crosslingual setting
haemmerl-etal-2023-speaking.paperResultsText: PMLMs encode moral biases that do not necessarily correspond to cultural differences
haemmerl-etal-2023-speaking.resourcesOtherText: OpenSubtitles parallel datasets, MoralDirections dataset, survey data
